CookieChangeEvent.summary: The CookieChangeEvent interface of the 'Cookie Store API' is the event type of the event fired at a when any cookie changes occur. A cookie change consists of a cookie and a type (either "changed" or "deleted").

remarks.para: Cookie changes that will cause the CookieChangeEvent to be dispatched are:

blockquote.para: Note: A cookie that is replaced due to the insertion of another cookie with the same name, domain, and path, is ignored and does not trigger a change event.
